subject: NCAA Basketball Championships (Men)
Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: Indiana’s Kevin Ferrell Jr. was an elite ball handler at a young age. But his father took him out of basketball for two years, a move that helped define him, Ferrell said.
snippet: Indiana’s Kevin Ferrell Jr. was an elite ball handler at a young age. But his father took him out of basketball for two years, a move that helped define him, Ferrell said.
